      • addItem

        public static int addItem(String itemName,
                          int shopping_list_id)
        * Inserts a row to the Item table, and associates it with a shopping list
        Parameters:
        itemName - the name of the item to be added to the database
        shopping_list_id - the shopping list ID of the shopping list to be associated with the item
        Returns:
        -1 if an error occurred, returns 1 if no errors occurred

        a int.

      • updateCheckedBy

        public static int updateCheckedBy(int userId,
                                  int itemId)
        Updates a column in the Item table, and sets the checkedBy to a userId
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID of the user who checked off the item
        itemId - the item ID of the item that has been checked off
        Returns:
        number of rows that have been altered, or -1 if an error occurred

        Returns:

      • updateUserInShoppingList

        public static int updateUserInShoppingList(int shoppingListId,
                                           int userId,
                                           boolean delete)
        Updates a row in the User_Shopping_list table if 'delete' == true, a row will be deleted if not a row will be added
        Parameters:
        shoppingListId - the shopping list ID
        userId - the user ID
        delete - decides if the method should delete or add
        Returns:
        -1 if an error occurs, 1 if no errors occurred
